Package core

Class Vec3.ComparatorDist

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.Vec3.AbstrComparator
      • core.Vec3.ComparatorDist
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Comparator<Vec3>
    Enclosing class:
    Vec3
    public static class Vec3.ComparatorDist
extends Vec3.AbstrComparator
    Compares two vectors by their distance from a locus. The locus should be set in the creation of the comparator.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      Vec3 aDiff
      The difference between the locus and left comparisand.
      Vec3 bDiff
      The difference between the locus and right comparisand.
      Vec3 locus
      The locus against which points are compared.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ComparatorDist()
      The default constructor.
      ComparatorDist​(Vec3 locus)
      A constructor which sets a locus against which two points are compared.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int compare​(Vec3 a, Vec3 b)
      Compares two vectors by subtracting the locus from each, then comparing the dot products of the respective differences.

      • Methods inherited from class core.Vec3.AbstrComparator
